Xiaguan district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
Shimonoseki, city in Yamaguchi Prefecture, Japan

sentences.english: All trains and buses from Kunming arrive in New Dali(Xiaguan).
sentences.chinese: 所有從昆明出發的火車和汽車都只到達大理下關新城。

sentences.english: I have been to many places like Kunming, Dali and Xiaguan.
sentences.chinese: 我去過許多地方，像昆明啊，大理啊，下關等。

sentences.english: Xiaguan Riverfront will be a collection of new neighborhoods.
sentences.chinese: 南京下關濱江區將成爲一個新的社區聚集區。

sentences.english: Nanjing Xiaguan Tourist Bureau All Rights Reserved.
sentences.chinese: 南京市下關區旅遊局保留所有權利。

sentences.english: The fleet departed from the southern Japan port of Shimonoseki late Sunday night.
sentences.chinese: 捕鯨艦隊在週日夜間駛離下關港市的港口。
